description: Wear Watch Call application allows you to call directly from your Android wear watch.You can call a person, get  contact deatils  from Android wear watch according to alphabetics.Features:- Sync contacts from Mobile device to Android Wear Watch with photos and mobile numbers- You can search contact of person according to alphabetics - Call from wear watch - Android Wear application must be installed into your mobile device to sending this application to Android Wear Watch- User can look at contact details with their photos- User can also switch on spekar of mobile devices while calling from Android Wear Watch
descriptionHTML:
Wear Watch Call application allows you to call directly from your Android wear watch.
You can call a person, get contact deatils from Android wear watch according to alphabetics.


Features:
- Sync contacts from Mobile device to Android Wear Watch with photos and mobile numbers
- You can search contact of person according to alphabetics
- Call from wear watch
- Android Wear application must be installed into your mobile device to sending this application to Android Wear Watch
- User can look at contact details with their photos
- User can also switch on spekar of mobile devices while calling from Android Wear Watch
comments: Simply not working and also the UI doesen`t fit properly the moto360 screen
Buggy Contacts don't come over from phone or if they do, they can disappear for no apparent reason.
recentChanges: Resolution issue for Moto 360 wear watch has been solved.
